common.name: Name
common.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.

login.title: Admin login
login.description: Enter your admin email to receive a one-time sign-in code.

otp.title: Enter verification code
otp.label: Verification code
otp.hint: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your email.
otp.missingEmail: Missing email. Please start from the login page.
otp.adminOnly: Only administrators can access this dashboard.

users.title: User Management
users.description: Manage rider accounts. All admins can view this page.
users.banMessage: {{name}} will be unable to sign in. You can unban them later.
users.unbanMessage: {{name}} will be able to sign in again.
users.deleteMessage: {{name}} will be permanently removed. This cannot be undone.
users.revokeMessage: {{name}} will be signed out from all devices.

adminUsers.title: Admin Management
adminUsers.description: Manage admin users (Admin, Manager, Operation, Superadmin). Only superadmins can access this page.
adminUsers.changeRoleMessage: Change {{name}}'s role to {{role}}? This will update their permissions immediately.
adminUsers.setPasswordDescription: Set a new password for {{name}}. They can use it to sign in with email/password.

createUser.title: Create user
createUser.description: Add a new user to the platform. They can sign in with email OTP or the password you set.

pricing.title: Pricing Engine
pricing.description: Configure fares, distance-based per-km rates, special day overrides, and peak-hour surges per vehicle type.

fareFormula.title: Fare formula
fareFormula.total: Total = Base Fare + Distance Fare + (Duration min × Time Rate) + Booking Fee + Township Surcharge
fareFormula.distanceFare: Distance Fare: Each km uses the per-km rate of the distance band it falls into. If no bands are set, the default per-km rate is used for the entire trip.
fareFormula.specialDays: Special Days: On weekends or selected holidays, the special day per-km rate replaces distance bands entirely.
fareFormula.townshipSurcharge: Township Surcharge: A fixed charge applied when a ride enters or exits a designated township. If both pickup and destination are in the same township, no charge applies.
fareFormula.surgeNote: Surge & Plus premium are applied on top. Result is rounded to the nearest 100 MMK.

township.title: Township Fixed Charges
township.description: Define a fixed charge for specific townships. The charge is applied whenever a ride enters or exits the township. If both pickup and destination are within the same township, no charge applies.
township.helpText: This charge is added to the fare when a ride starts in this township and ends elsewhere, or starts elsewhere and ends here. No charge for intra-township trips.
township.deleteDescription: This will permanently remove this township surcharge rule. The in-memory cache will be updated immediately.

configSheet.distanceBandsDesc: Each km of the trip uses the rate of the band it falls into. Leave empty to use the default per-km rate for all distances.
configSheet.specialDaysDesc: On matching days the special per-km rate replaces distance bands entirely. Enable "Weekend" and/or pick holiday dates from the calendar.
configSheet.timeRulesDesc: Time windows where a higher surge multiplier applies.

dispatch.title: Driver Search Rounds
dispatch.description: Configure how the dispatch system searches for drivers. Each round expands the search radius. The interval controls how long to wait before moving to the next round.
dispatch.empty: No dispatch rounds configured. Using defaults (0.8 km, 1.5 km, 2.5 km).

content.title: Content Management
content.description: Manage promotional banners and announcements displayed in the mobile app.

banners.title: Banners
banners.description: Promotional banners shown in the home screen carousel. Lower priority = shown first.
banners.empty: No banners yet. Create your first banner above.
banners.imageHint: Optimized to 1200 x 480 WebP on upload.
banners.deleteDescription: This will permanently delete the banner and its image. This action cannot be undone.

announcements.title: Announcements
announcements.description: Admin announcements displayed as post cards on the home screen.
announcements.empty: No announcements yet. Create your first one above.
announcements.myanmarTitleLabel: ခေါင်းစဉ် / Title
announcements.myanmarTitlePlaceholder: ကြေညာချက် ခေါင်းစဉ် (မြန်မာ)
announcements.myanmarBodyLabel: အကြောင်းအရာ / Body
announcements.thumbnailHint: Optimized to 400 x 400 WebP on upload.
announcements.deleteDescription: This will permanently delete the announcement. This action cannot be undone.

upload.formats: JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF — max 10 MB

drivers.title: Driver Management
drivers.description: Manage driver accounts, verify documents, and approve or reject drivers.

create.title: Add Driver
create.description: Create a new driver account. The driver can sign in with email OTP after approval.

dialogs.approveMessage: {{name}} will be able to sign in to the driver app.
dialogs.rejectMessage: {{name}} will not be able to sign in. You can change this later.
dialogs.suspendMessage: {{name}} will be suspended and unable to sign in or receive rides.
dialogs.deleteMessage: {{name}} and all associated data will be permanently removed. This cannot be undone.
dialogs.revokeMessage: {{name}} will be signed out from all devices.

drivers.empty: No drivers yet. Create the first driver account above.
